        logCustomEvent

    • Method Detail

      • logAuthenticationEvent

        void logAuthenticationEvent(PublicAPI tools,
                            java.lang.String eventType,
                            java.lang.String outcome,
                            java.lang.String message,
                            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> customFlds)
        API to log authentication events. Check the SecurityEventConstants for the event types that fall under authentication category.
        Parameters:
        tools - instance of Executable.
        eventType - SecurityEventConstant that describes the eventType.
        outcome - SecurityEventConstant that describes the outcome, whether success/failure.
        message - Any information related to the event to be logged.
        customFlds - Any custom fields relevant to the event to be logged.This can be a java HashMap or can be a clipboardpage.

      • logOAuth2SecurityEvent

        void logOAuth2SecurityEvent(PublicAPI tools,
                            java.lang.String eventType,
                            java.lang.String outcome,
                            java.lang.String message,
                            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> customFlds)

      • logDataAccessEvent

        void logDataAccessEvent(PublicAPI tools,
                        java.lang.String eventType,
                        java.lang.String outcome,
                        java.lang.String message,
                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> customFlds)
        API to log DataAccess events. Check the SecurityEventConstants for the event types that fall under DataAccess category.
        Parameters:
        tools - instance of Executable.
        eventType - SecurityEventConstant that describes the eventType.
        outcome - SecurityEventConstant that describes the outcome, whether success/failure.
        message - Any information related to the event to be logged.
        customFlds - Any custom fields relevant to the event to be logged.This can be a java HashMap or can be a clipboardpage.

        Parameters:

      • logDefaultEvent

        void logDefaultEvent(PublicAPI tools,
                     java.lang.String eventCategory,
                     java.lang.String eventType,
                     java.lang.String outcome,
                     java.lang.String message,
                     java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> customFlds)
        API to log default events. These are the events that must be logged for security audit
        Parameters:
        tools - instance of Executable.
        eventCategory - SecurityEventConstant that describes the eventCategory.
        eventType - SecurityEventConstant that describes the eventType.
        outcome - SecurityEventConstant that describes the outcome, whether success/failure.
        message - Any information related to the event to be logged.
        customFlds - Any custom fields relevant to the event to be logged.This can be a java HashMap or can be a clipboardpage.

      • loadSecEventLogSettings

        void loadSecEventLogSettings(PRThread prThread,
                             ClipboardPage page)
        API to update the configuration changes across the cluster.
        Parameters:
        prThread - thread information.
        page - ClipboardPage with data on note change.

      • isEventLoggable

        boolean isEventLoggable(PublicAPI tools,
                        java.lang.String eventType,
                        java.lang.Boolean evntOutCome)
        API to intimate whether event is configured to be logged or not.
        Parameters:
        tools - instance of Executable.
        eventType - SecurityEventConstant that describes the eventType.
        evntOutCome - Boolean value that describes the outcome true on success false on failure. if outcome is not applicable for the event set the outcome value to null.
        Returns:
        true, if loggable otherwise false.

      • initializeCache

        void initializeCache(PRThread thread,
                     java.lang.String tenantName)
        API to initialize configuration cache.
        Parameters:
        thread - requestor thread.
        tenantName - tenant for which cache has to be initialized.
